channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #欧盟就预算规则改革达成协议
item.description: #BREAKING EU reaches agreement on reform of budget rules

item.title:
在帕勒克勒举行的三场单日国际比赛系列赛的首场比赛中，帕图姆-尼桑卡（Pathum Nissanka）以破纪录的两个世纪的成绩带领斯里兰卡队以 42 分的优势轻松战胜阿富汗队。
#AFPSports #SRIvsAFG
item.description:
Pathum Nissanka's record-breaking double century steered Sri Lanka to a comfortable 42-run win over Afghanistan in the opener of their three-match one-day international series at Pallekele.

u.afp.com/5Gea #AFPSports #SRIvsAFG

item.title: 智利为前总统塞巴斯蒂安-皮聂拉举行了国葬，他在本周驾驶的直升机坠入湖中身亡。
item.description:
Chile has held a state funeral for former president Sebastian Pinera, who died this week when the helicopter he was piloting plummeted into a lake.

u.afp.com/5Geb

item.title:
R to @AFP：美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）官员证实，该联盟将在 2025 赛季期间首次在西班牙举行常规赛，比赛将在皇家马德里新翻修的圣地亚哥-伯纳乌球场举行，该联盟将继续向海外市场扩张。
#AFPSports
item.description:
The NFL will stage its first ever regular season game in Spain during the 2025 season at Real Madrid's newly refurbished Santiago Bernabeu Stadium, officials confirmed, as the league continues its expansion into overseas markets.

u.afp.com/5Geu #AFPSports

item.title: 美国演员西格妮-韦弗（Sigourney Weaver）说，#MeToo 运动 "带来了巨大的改变"，因为女性现在感到更有力量对不受欢迎的先进性说不。
item.description:
The #MeToo movement "made a big difference" since women now feel more empowered to say no to unwanted sexual advanced, US actor Sigourney Weaver has said.

u.afp.com/5GeL

item.title:
没有任何一名球员能像前锋塞巴斯蒂安-哈勒尔（Sebastien Haller）一样，象征着象牙海岸队在本周末的非洲国家杯决赛中的出色逆转。
#AFPSports #AFCON
item.description:
No single player symbolizes Ivory Coast's remarkable turnaround to reach this weekend's Africa Cup of Nations final quite like striker Sebastien Haller.

u.afp.com/5Gee #AFPSports #AFCON

item.title: R to @AFP：#塞内加尔安全部队向首都的抗议者发射催泪瓦斯，因为推迟总统选举引发的愤怒情绪日益高涨，这也造成了第一名受害者--一名学生在北部城镇圣路易丧生。
item.description:
#UPDATE Senegalese security forces fired tear gas at protesters in the capital as mounting anger over the postponement of a presidential election claimed a first victim -- a student was killed in the northern town of Saint-Louis.

u.afp.com/5GeE

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATE 美国地震学家说，夏威夷发生了强烈地震，但没有发生海啸的危险。
item.description:
#UPDATE A strong earthquake hit Hawaii, US seismologists said, but there was no danger of a tsunami.

u.afp.com/5GeB

item.title:
德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）和美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）敦促美国立法者批准一项拖延已久的乌克兰军事援助计划，并警告说如果没有这项计划，基辅将无法抵挡俄罗斯的入侵。
作者：@dannyctkemp
item.description:
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz and President Joe Biden urged US lawmakers to approve a long-delayed military aid package for Ukraine, warning that Kyiv could not hold off Russia's invasion without it.

u.afp.com/5Geh by @dannyctkemp

item.title:
R to @AFP：作为奥运会百米银牌得主的孙子，克里斯蒂安-麦卡弗里习惯性地将 NFL 后卫甩在身后，这一点也不足为奇。
在超级碗比赛中，他将成为 49 人队最有力的进攻武器之一。
#AFPSports
item.description:
As the grandson of an Olympic 100m silver medalist, it is little surprise that Christian McCaffrey has made a habit of leaving NFL defenders in his wake.

In the #SuperBowl, he will be one of the 49ers' most potent offensive weapons.

u.afp.com/5Ge7 #AFPSports

item.title: #塞内加尔学生在政治抗议活动中丧生，这是骚乱中第一位确认的受害者：大学和医院消息来源
item.description: #BREAKING Student killed in Senegal political protests, first confirmed victim of unrest: university, hospital sources

item.title:
印尼总统候选人在社交媒体上发布轻松内容，以吸引年轻选民，他们打扮得像汤姆-克鲁斯（Tom Cruise）在《绝命毒师》（Top Gun）中扮演的角色，组织舞蹈比赛或忘记关闭直播流媒体。
作者：@nisyakunto @pjalankaki
item.description:
Indonesia's presidential candidates are posting light content on social media in a push to appeal to young voters, dressing up like Tom Cruise in "Top Gun", organizing dance contests or forgetting to turn off a live stream.

u.afp.com/5Ge4 by @nisyakunto @pjalankaki

item.title:
R to @AFP：49 人队主教练凯尔-沙纳汉（Kyle Shanahan）曾两次率队参加 #SuperBowl 超级碗比赛，但都以失败告终，他希望能在拉斯维加斯第三次幸运地夺冠。
作者：@Robwoollard_AFP #AFPSports
item.description:
After seeing his teams snatch defeat from the jaws of victory on his two previous visits to the #SuperBowl , 49ers head coach Kyle Shanahan is hoping to strike it third time lucky in Las Vegas.

u.afp.com/5GeS by @robwoollard_afp #AFPSports

item.title: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）领导的政府放宽了安全部队使用枪支的规定，允许安全部队为防止严重犯罪或自卫而开枪。
item.description:
Argentine President Javier Milei's government has relaxed the rules around the use of firearms by security forces, allowing them to shoot someone to prevent a serious crime, or in self-defense.

u.afp.com/5Gef

item.title:
瓜迪奥拉（Pep Guardiola）说，曼城队不能把对埃弗顿队的胜利视为理所当然，尽管他们最近对太妃糖的战绩非常出色，但他们仍希望重返英超榜首。
#AFPSports
item.description:
Pep Guardiola says Manchester City cannot afford to take victory against Everton for granted as they bid to return to the top of the Premier League despite a formidable recent record against the Toffees.

u.afp.com/5GeZ #AFPSports

item.title: R to @AFP：#以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡的办公室称，以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡已命令军队准备从加沙的拉法 "撤离 "数十万巴勒斯坦人，巴勒斯坦领导人马哈茂德-阿巴斯称，计划中的进攻越过了 "所有红线"。
item.description:
#UPDATE Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered the army to prepare to "evacuate" hundreds of thousands of Palestinians from Gaza's Rafah, his office said, as Palestinian leader Mahmud Abbas said the planned offensive crossed "all red lines."

u.afp.com/5Gex

item.title: #夏威夷发生强烈地震：美国地震学家
item.description: #BREAKING Strong earthquake hits Hawaii: US seismologists

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：白宫对一份批评乔-拜登（Joe Biden）记忆力衰退的破坏性特别顾问报告发起了猛烈反击，称这是在大选年对总统的政治打击。
作者：@dannyctkemp
item.description:
#UPDATE The White House launched a fierce fightback against a devastating special counsel report that criticized Joe Biden's failing memory, describing it as a political hit-job on the president in an election year.

u.afp.com/5Gew by @dannyctkemp

item.title: 西非地区集团呼吁与布基纳法索、马里和尼日尔进行 "和解"，此前，这些受政变影响的国家就退出该集团举行了紧急会谈。
item.description:
West Africa's regional bloc called for "reconciliation" with Burkina Faso, Mali and Niger after emergency talks on the coup-hit countries' withdrawal from the group.

u.afp.com/5Gsy

item.title:
R to @AFP：无论在周日的超级碗比赛中获胜还是失利，堪萨斯城酋长队四分卫帕特里克-马霍姆斯（Patrick Mahomes）都已经在通往 NFL 不朽的道路上迈出了坚实的一步。
作者：@Robwoollard_AFP #AFPSports#超级碗
item.description:
Whether he wins or loses in Sunday's Super Bowl, Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes is already well on his way to NFL immortality.

u.afp.com/5GsA by @robwoollard_afp #AFPSports #SuperBowl

item.title: #美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯抨击拜登文件调查中 "出于政治动机 "的年龄评论
item.description: #BREAKING US Vice President Kamala Harris slams 'politically motivated' age comments in Biden documents probe

item.title: R to @AFP：小泽征尔简介小泽征尔是日本著名指挥家，他在古典音乐领域开辟了一条道路，将东方传统与西方音乐联系在一起。
item.description:
PROFILE: Two broken fingers in a rugby match changed everything for Seiji Ozawa, the celebrated Japanese conductor who blazed a trail in classical music, connecting Eastern traditions with the West.

u.afp.com/5Gsc

🧵The biggest party in American sports is about to get even bigger Sunday when the San Francisco 49ers and the Kansas City Chiefs battle it out in #SuperBowlLVIII.

@robwoollard_afp is in Vegas to cover the spectacle

u.afp.com/5GsY #AFPSports #SuperBowl

item.title: R to @AFP：#随着计票工作进入最后阶段，忠于被监禁的前总理伊姆兰-汗的候选人在巴基斯坦大选中领先于被认为受到军方支持的两个王朝政党。
item.description:
#UPDATE Candidates loyal to jailed former prime minister Imran Khan were ahead in Pakistan's election, in front of the two dynastic parties believed favored by the military, as the vote count entered its final leg.

u.afp.com/5Gsq

item.title: R to @AFP：#菲律宾南部一个金矿开采村庄发生山体滑坡，导致死亡人数增加了近一倍，达到27人，救援人员从泥浆中找到了更多尸体 ➡️。
item.description: #UPDATE The death toll from a landslide that hit a gold-mining village in the southern Philippines nearly doubled to 27 on Friday, officials said, as rescuers retrieved more bodies from the mud ➡️ u.afp.com/5Gmb

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡的办公室周五表示，内塔尼亚胡已命令军队准备从加沙拉法 "疏散 "数十万巴勒斯坦人，此前华盛顿警告称不会支持对该城市的任何地面进攻 ➡️
item.description: #UPDATE Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered the army to prepare to "evacuate" hundreds of thousands of Palestinians from Gaza's Rafah, his office said on Friday, after Washington warned it would not support any ground assault on the city ➡️ u.afp.com/5GmX

item.title: R to @AFP：#警方和前总理伊姆兰-汗的政党称，周五在巴基斯坦西北部，警方与伊姆兰-汗的追随者发生冲突，造成两人死亡，这是因选举计票混乱而首次确认的死亡事件 ➡️
item.description: #UPDATE Two people were killed in northwest Pakistan on Friday in a confrontation between police and followers of ex-prime minister Imran Khan, police and his party said, the first confirmed fatalities over a fractious election count ➡️ u.afp.com/5Gms

item.title: 日本著名指挥家小泽征尔曾领导过世界知名的交响乐团，他的管理层周五宣布，小泽征尔在东京家中去世，享年 88 岁 ➡️。
item.description: Celebrated Japanese conductor Seiji Ozawa, who led world-renowned orchestras, died at his home in Tokyo aged 88, his management announced on Friday ➡️ u.afp.com/5GmA

item.title:
RT：@AFP：塞拉利昂正在与年轻人滥用毒品的流行病作斗争。 网上流传的一张照片声称有瘾君子在盗墓。
但这是假的：@Tonyevill3 解释了他是如何使用反向图片搜索找到照片的原始背景的⬇️。
item.description:
Sierra Leone is battling an epidemic of drug abuse by its youth. A photo circulating online claims to show addicts robbing graves.

But this is false: @Tonyevill3 explains how he used a reverse image search to find the original context of the photo⬇️

u.afp.com/5Gmc

item.title: 由 @AFP 提供的 RT：#AFP 本周图片（2月3日-2月9日）
item.description: #AFP PICTURES OF THE WEEK (February 03-09) u.afp.com/5GA2
